params.markdown:
The following dashboard provides insights into the following -
- Total number of GPUs monitored
- GPU utilization
- GPU power consumption
- Total free and used memory framebuffer size
- Total time spent on throttling

query.query: data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.error.xid:* and not gpu.error.xid : 0

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X0.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X1.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X2.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X3.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X4.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X5.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

537d8f07-0a3c-440b-81f7-c357e525c6c5X6.label: Part of Total time spent throttled

query.query: data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu.pct:*
